title: Macht gut sauber, wenn die WaMa stimmt
content: Diese Caps sind echt gut, wenn die WaMa nicht eine Wasserspar-Maschine ist. name: GM in CT
title: Five Stars!
content: I've purchased Persil 5 times over two years now, and I couldn't be happier. This evidently is the same German formula that I used in Austria, and it cleans better than any American-made detergent that I have ever used. My whites are brighter than what Tide used to do, and the clothes are noticeably cleaner overall, and is a great stain-fighter. I use it in my HE machine and have never had an issue. I will take almost any European made product over it's American made counterpart any day. Five stars all the way.

name: PhotoGraphics
title: But is it better
content: This must be one of the most misunderstood products I can think of. And there are countless reviews for the brand name but it‚Äôs almost impossible to tell which of the many variances they are talking about, especially the one about the product that‚Äôs made for the Americas is not in any way the same as what is made for and sold in Germany. I can only advise to read every word of the product description to be sure you are getting what you expect. The other thing is the huge pricing variance, it is substantial and if you are required to pay to get it sent to you that can almost double the price, a box of detergent is very heavy.. I have been getting the 44 load size for a long time until the price skyrocketed. And while that can change daily or even minute to minute this time I ended up with the 100 loads megapack. I included a photo to show the size difference, it is not a minor detail. But it was the best deal at the time and we will use it ‚Äì eventually.. As far as how good it cleans, you can read all 10,000 reviews and still not know how it will work in your washer, with your water, on your clothes. There is only one way to know that which is to buy it and try it for yourself. I can only advise that if you get the real stuff directly from Germany you will probably find that what everyone is saying is true. This is probably the best laundry detergent you can get.
language: OT: (Recenzowano w Stanach Zjednoczonych üá∫üá∏ w dniu 30 stycznia 2021)

name: Total Darkness
title: The Nuclear Option
content: What to do with clothes from a sweaty dirty job? Tried the best American detergents but still not fully satisfied. Read about original German Persil and its ‚Äúmagic‚Äù cleaning power quite by accident. Ordered a box for the heck of it and put it to the test. Just dumped a whole load of nasty uniforms and the middle dosage of Persil into the washer with no presoaks or collar pretreatment and ran a normal warm cycle with extra rinse ( I am sensitive to detergent) as I usually do. Amazing! Clean uniforms right out of the box! I thought maybe I‚Äôd fallen for the hype but after using this detergent for a few months exclusively, several of my coworkers asked me right out of the blue, how do I keep my uniforms so fresh!. The detergent also rinses completely so no problems with sensitivity. It is expensive but worth every penny. To save money I use American Persil (just not as effective as the German but still better than Tide) and keep the German stuff for the last resort.
